p: Phylogenetic analysis. NA sequencing of the complete HA was performed according to WHO guidance [20]. In cases of low influenza B concentration an alternative protocol generating three instead of two overlapping fragments was used [21]. Phylogenetic trees of the 1710 nucleotides large HA coding region were constructed at nucleotide level with the MEGA software version 6 using the Maximum-Likelihood method. Bootstrap analysis was performed with 1000 replicates [22]. Complete HA sequences were submitted to Genbank (accession numbers MK459565 - MK459656).
